bibl.title: Reconstructing and Re-editing the Archive of Bishop Pesynthius of Koptos / Keft (7th Century).
bibl.note: Introduction. - Modern history of the archive. - Papyri in the Musée du Louvre in Paris. - Provenance of the documents. - A glimpse into the bishop's papers. - Conclusions.

bibl.title: Current Research in Egyptology 2010. Proceedings of the Eleventh Annual Symposium which Took Place at Leiden University, the Netherlands, January 2010

bibl.seg: Dekker Renate, Reconstructing and Re-editing the Archive of Bishop Pesynthius of Koptos / Keft (7th Century).

Maarten Horn, Joost Kramer, Daniel Soliman, Nico Staring, Carina van den Hoven and Lara Weiss (Edd.), Current Research in Egyptology 2010. Proceedings of the Eleventh Annual Symposium which Took Place at Leiden University, the Netherlands, January 2010 (Oxford, 2011) pp. 33-41, 2 figg.
Introduction. - Modern history of the archive. - Papyri in the Musée du Louvre in Paris. - Provenance of the documents. - A glimpse into the bishop's papers. - Conclusions.
